page.title: 19RELIGION, SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: {RELIGION }A good third of the village attend church - if not regularly - and involve themselves in church functions The churches are the parish church of St Mary Magdalen (15 C), Gospel Hall, Congregational (1633), Methodist and Catholic.{SOCIAL CONCERNS}What follows are comments made in answer to the questionnaire's "You satisfied with the existing facilities?" A fish&chip shop needed...Streets & paths looking smarter...Natural landscape to be conserved...Secondary education to 18. ..Health - A cry for a lady doctor - Medicine direct to elderly infirm patients at home - A dentist - St John's Ambulance Brigade - Well-Women' s Clinic...A record library...More local buses...cheap transport to the station (3 km away)...Improvement to blocked streets (probably made by a bus driver while at under 5 km hr in
